Actions.Name: Get Active
Actions.Description: Get the total numbers of active cases

Actions.Name: Get Confirmed
Actions.Description: Get the total numbers of confirmed cases

Actions.Name: Get Country
Actions.Description: Get the data based on a county's name or its ISO code

Actions.Name: Get Current Us
Actions.Description: Get all data from USA's current situation

Actions.Name: Get Current
Actions.Description: Get the current situation data from all reported countries

Actions.Name: Get Deaths
Actions.Description: Get the total numbers of death cases

Actions.Name: Get Recovered
Actions.Description: Get the total numbers of recovered cases

Actions.Name: Get Time Series
Actions.Description: Get the time series based on a given case: global, confirmed, deaths, recovered

Actions.Name: Get Total
Actions.Description: Get the total numbers of all cases
